name: Node-csgo
tagline: A node-steam plugin for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive.
body:
### node-csgo
A node-steam plugin to make communication with Valve's Counter-Strike: Global Offensive servers easy.

### Installation
Run `npm install csgo` to install as a node module.

An example is provided in the examples directory of this project.

### Credits
Author: [Josh Ferrara](http://joshua-ferrara.com/) (@joshuaferrara)

Based off of [node-dota2](https://github.com/RJacksonm1/node-dota2) created by @RJacksonm1
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
